column2: "Four-person family monthly costs: 3,885.11$ (440,711.45¥) without rent (using our estimator).A single person monthly costs: 1,079.07$ (122,405.65¥) without rent.Cost of living index in Tokyo is 13.65% lower than in New York.Cost of living rank 18th out of 447 cities in the world.Tokyo has a  cost of living index of 86.35."
